sentences.simplifiedText: 戴先生是我们的新邻居，他昨天刚搬来。
sentences.traditionalText: 戴先生是我們的新鄰居，他昨天剛搬來。
sentences.pinyin: Dài xiānshēng shì wǒmen de xīn línjū, tā zuótiān gāng bān lái.
sentences.translation: Mr. Dai is our new neighbor, he just moved in yesterday.

definitions.meaning: to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ dài shàngle wǒ de yǎnjìng.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管外面很热，他仍然戴着帽子。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管外面很熱，他仍然戴著帽子。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn wàimiàn hěn rè, tā réngrán dàizhe màozi.
sentences.translation: Despite the heat outside, he still wears a hat.

sentences.pinyin: Tā dài zhe yī fù yǎnjìng.
sentences.translation: He is wearing a pair of glasses.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然天气炎热，但他照旧戴着那顶草帽。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然天氣炎熱，但他照舊戴著那頂草帽。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán tiānqì yánrè, dàn tā zhào jiù dài zhe nà dǐng cǎomào.
sentences.translation: Despite the hot weather, he still wore that straw hat.
